document_data.name: ''Potion of Frenzy''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potions of frenzy''''' were magic concoctions that allowed the imbiber to enter a state of rage, similar to that of a [[berserker]] [[barbarian]].
document_data.Description: These [[potion]]s were vials of swirling red liquid.
document_data.Powers: Consumption of a ''potion of frenzy'' was similar in effect to the ''[[blood frenzy]]'' spell. The imbiber entered a state of battle berserker rage. Their strength and stamina increased, as well as their mental defenses, however the state of frenzy made them easier targets for successful strikes.
document_data.Notable Owners:
* The [[Green Hag of Lizard Marsh]] possessed a rich collection of magic potions, tinctures, and brews. Among them were ''potion of polymorph'' of her own creation.
* [[Uzzak-Szalzik]], a [[lizardfolk]] [[shaman]] from the [[Lizard Marsh]] ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].
